mainText:
The world will miss Steve Jobs forever.

He was so much in our lives that this loss feels like as a personal loss. 

He laid the path for people to think differently and not just within Apple but all over the world. Steve Jobs changed our lives.

He will be remembered for centuries to come and I feel privileged to have lived in his era. I pray for his family 
and hope God gives them strength.

For Apple, I hope it creates the future which Steve Jobs imagined.
author: Saurabh
